asinVariationValues.variationValue: Grey Orange Spray Mop with 3 Reusable Pads
Lake Blue Spray Mop with 4 Reusable Pads

features: [Make cleaning efficient and effortless]You could fill the bottle with water or your favorite cleaner.Simply push the trigger then the sprinkler turns water or detergent into a spray.Save water and cleaning time.

[Lightweight and Convenient]Say goodbye to buckets or heavy mops.Lightweight design makes cleaning easier.Ergonomic handle is comfortable to grip and new generation of liquid release device that you can operate it with only one hand.

[Wet & Dry Spray Mop]The mop comes with two kind of washable pads to achieve wet and dry cleaning in one mop better.The Floor Mop with Spray can be used as both wet mop and dry mop.Microfiber mop cloths are effective at cleaning dirt and hair.
[Multifunctional and 360 Rotating]Our mop suitable to clean wooden floor, hardwood, cement, tile, and laminate floors.The mop head rotates 360 degrees to clean every corner of your home.

[3 Extra Replacement and Washable Mop Pads]Free 3 microfiber mop cloths, a mop holder and a scraper.These mop pads are great at picking up the dirt and grime from your floors.The scraper helps you to take away hairs, sewage and stubborn stains from the pads.Mop holder allow the mop to hang on the wall, saving space and keeping it dry.

[Tips]Due to the fact that each batch of microfiber spray mops undergoes nozzle testing before delivery, it is normal for small amounts of water to remain in the bottles and tubes.If you have any questions during the use of this microfiber mops with reusable pads, don't worry. We are honored to assist you and will provide you with a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wet & Dry Used Spray Mop The Floor Mop with Spray can be used as both wet mop and dry mop. 360° Rotating Mop Head The mop head rotates 360 degrees to clean every corner of your home. Efficient & Effortless Spray Simply push the trigger then the sprinkler turns water or detergent into a spray.

Spraying Mop Item Included: 1 x 360ML Water Tank1 x 360° Rotating Mop Head1 x Multifunctional Scraper1 x#304 Stainless Steel Mop Clip3 x High Strength Aluminum Poles6 x Reusable Mop Pads(1+5) 360ML Water Bottle The 360 ml spray bottle can be filled with the solution you choose. Use cleaning agents or water to meet your cleaning needs. Mop Clip The mop holder can help you store the mop anywhere. While saving space, it can also preserve the dryness of the mop, effectively extending its service life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble!
reviews.reviewText: Love this simple, easy to assemble, compact, non battery-operated mop!! :) You will save money because you can use your own cleaner OR water AND the sprayer creates a wide stream that reaches a good 2 feet in front. There's a trigger on the handle which works fine!! No cord or batteries! Only had for a month but love on my hardwood floors!!!! I just use plain water and then toss pad in the washer--such a money saving feature!!! No pads to throw away or buy and you get three pads!!! Great buy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m in love with this thing!
reviews.reviewText: I used a Swiffer with the disposable pads before and comparing the two, the pole on the Swiffer is flimsy and weak compared to this one’s. Also the pads are expensive to be buying all the time and I feel like the Swiffer doesn’t clean very well. This one is sturdier yet extremely lightweight and the microfiber pads are great scrubbers and being washable is an absolute money saver! The spray bottle works like a dream too. I love putting my favorite Mrs. Meyers surface cleaner in it. I highly recommend this if you’re sick of your Swiffer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that it comes with a few other pads. It was super easy to assemble and holds enough water solution. Sometimes my hand gets tired of spraying the water but it is so much easier than getting a bucket of water. Easy and efficient - makes the task of mopping my floors more manageable. and it doesn't take must space to store which is a plus! I truly recommend it! Perfect for small homes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, easy to put together (took about 5 seconds) just need to snap the pieces together and it’s easy to use. Easy cleaning. Works well on multiple surfaces, used on hardwood, tile, bathroom. Feels a little cheap since it’s light and plastic, but works and gets the job done! I like the reusable pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good.
reviews.reviewText: The mop works well. It's very lightweight but it's not cheap. It's surprisingly sturdy. No issues with the sprayer being wonky. Having extra mop heads is a major plus. They clean a lighly soiled floor well (like a bathroom or a hallway). I have not tried it with a heavily soiled floor. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unusable out of the box!
reviews.reviewText: Well, I can’t get a refund because I didn’t open and use this right away and now the return window has closed. But straight out of the box the sprayer did not work! It barely spits out the tiniest bit of water and then won’t even spray again for about twenty or thirty seconds. It’s absolutely worthless. (I am assuming I got a dud and if this actually WORKED it would be easy to use, good size, etc.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well if you are under 5’5”
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’6” and this is fine for me….I feel the handle wouldn’t be long enough for anyone taller as I’m already stooping to use it.The spray is wide and even, and I love that I can use my own cleaning solution, and that it doesn’t use batteries.Biggest concern is that there are no replacement mop head that can be bought (‘out of stock, don’t know if we’ll get this item again’), so that’s the main reason for the 3* review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good experience
reviews.reviewText: This mop was easy to assemble and it worked great for the first few months. Then it began to leak and wasn’t holding liquid.Update:I reached out to the company and they immediately offered a resolution. Great customer service. I look forward to trying their other products in the near future.
Work grapes Does exactly what it states it does.

This was easy to assemble, completed in less than 2 mins. Easy to use with 3 reusable microfiber pads this does a good cleaning job. The swivel head makes it great for harder to reach spots and the addition of a mounting bracket was useful.
So far working like a charm, useful and light
